name: The Sea Cleaner
description:
The sea Cleaner is a serious game which is intended to call on people to put more attention on marine environment. It plays like Gold Miner. Welcome to contact me if you find any bugs or have something you want to share with me. There will be further update.

Press the left key of the mouse to fire the grapple.

Press left or right key tou move the ship.

Main Programmer LI YuQi

Main Art designer Wang HaoYu
